name: P521.KeyAgreement.PrivateKey
desc: A P-521 private key used for key agreement.

items.name: init(compactRepresentable: Bool)
items.desc: Creates a random P-521 public key for key agreement.

items.name: init<Bytes>(rawRepresentation: Bytes)
items.desc: Creates a P-521 private key for key agreement from a collection of bytes.

items.name: init<Bytes>(derRepresentation: Bytes)
items.desc: Creates a P-521 private key for key agreement from a Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER) encoded representation.

items.name: init(pemRepresentation: String)
items.desc: Creates a P-521 private key for key agreement from a Privacy-Enhanced Mail (PEM) representation.

items.name: init<Bytes>(x963Representation: Bytes)
items.desc: Creates a P-521 private key for key agreement from an ANSI x9.63 representation.

items.name: var rawRepresentation: Data
items.desc: A data representation of the private key.

items.name: var derRepresentation: Data
items.desc: A Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER) encoded representation of the private key.

items.name: var pemRepresentation: String
items.desc: A Privacy-Enhanced Mail (PEM) representation of the private key.

items.name: var x963Representation: Data
items.desc: An ANSI x9.63 representation of the private key.

items.name: func sharedSecretFromKeyAgreement(with: P521.KeyAgreement.PublicKey) -> SharedSecret
items.desc: Computes a shared secret with the provided public key from another party.

items.name: struct SharedSecret
items.desc: A key agreement result from which you can derive a symmetric cryptographic key.
